DOC.brief_summary: To determine hypofractionated radiotherapy whole breast ( 4,250 cGy/16 fraction 22 day ) equally effective standard fractionate radiotherapy ( 5,000 cGy/25 fraction 35 day ) woman node negative breast cancer undergone lumpectomy . The primary outcome local breast recurrence secondary outcome include morbidity cost effectiveness .
DOC.brief_title: Hypofractionated Radiotherapy Post-Lumpectomy Women With Node Negative Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1 . The female patient histological diagnosis invasive carcinoma breast , evidence metastatic disease . 2 . Has lumpectomy ( include segmental resection partial mastectomy ) , , surgical excision tumour rim normal tissue . 3 . Patient axillary dissection , OR patient axillary dissection , node negative metastatic disease . 1 . Tumour great 5 cm great diameter pathological examination . 2 . The presence invasive intraductal ( noninvasive ) breast cancer involve surgical margin . 3 . Clinical evidence prior surgery infiltration skin involve breast edema , ulceration , fixation tumour underlie muscle , inflammatory breast cancer . 4 . Bilateral malignancy breast ( synchronous metachronous ) . 5 . More one primary invasive tumour breast . 6 . Previous surgery breast cancer . 7 . Pathological status axilla unknown . 8 . Status adjuvant systemic therapy determine . 9 . For patient treat adjuvant chemotherapy : unable commence radiation therapy within 16 week last surgical procedure breast . 10 . For patient treat adjuvant chemotherapy : unable commence radiation therapy within 8 week last dose chemotherapy . 11 . Serious nonmalignant disease ( eg . cardiovascular , renal , etc . ) would preclude surgical radiation treatment . 12 . Currently pregnant lactating . 13 . Breast deem large permit satisfactory radiation ( ie . separation > 25 cm ) . 14 . Previous concomitant malignancy type except squamous , basal cell carcinoma skin , carcinoma \fIin situ\fR cervix effectively treat . 15 . Geographic inaccessibility followup . 16 . Psychiatric addictive disorder preclude obtain inform consent adherence protocol .
